attributes.action: Cease innapropriate smiling on YouTube and Tv as this is frightening children and causing livestock to stampede
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Ministers abortive attempts at emulating the 'Blair smile' has been shown to frighten the vulnerable, has sent the FT100 into freefall and is now known to be causing ewes and heiffers to abort spontaneously. We the People beg the PM that he cease this innapropriate behaviour and that he remain the 'Dour Scot' that we Brits all know and love.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
